This letter is to acknowledge that the supplement from Dependable Claims Specialists LLC in the amount of \$319,063.78 was received in our office on October 30, 2024.
After an inspection with a large loss adjuster and an engineer
Any person who knowingly presents a false or fraudulent claim for the payment of a loss is guilty of a crime and may be subject to fines and confinement in state prison.
